WITH WW AS ( SELECT A.ID , A.TITLE , A.USER_ID , FN_USER_NAME(A.USER_ID) USER_NAME , FN_TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATE_DATE , A.HIT , A.WRITE_YMD , A.BBS_CATEGORY , A.ATTACH_FILE_URL1 , A.ATTACH_FILE_URL2 , A.ATTACH_FILE_URL3 , A.ATTACH_FILE_URL4 , A.ATTACH_FILE_URL5
, CASE WHEN FN_TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') <= FN_TO_CHAR(A.DATE_TO, 'YYYYMMDD') THEN A.BANNER_REGI_YN ELSE 'N' END BANNER_REGI_YN
, A.BBS_SHOW_YN , FN_CODE_NAME('NOTICE_CATEGORY',A.BBS_CATEGORY) BBS_CATEGORY_NAME , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ID) RID , A.CMGRP_CD FROM BBS A WHERE BBS_TYPE = 'A' AND WRITE_YMD > '19900101' AND CMGRP_CD = #{loginCmgrpCd} ) SELECT * FROM WW WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE LIKE '%' + #{searchTxt} + '%'
AND CONTENTS LIKE '%' + #{searchTxt} + '%'
AND ( TITLE LIKE '%' + #{searchTxt} + '%' OR CONTENTS LIKE '%' + #{searchTxt} + '%' )
AND WRITE_YMD = #{searchTxt}
AND FN_USER_NAME(USER_ID) LIKE '%' + #{searchTxt} + '%'
AND BBS_CATEGORY = #{searchGubun}
AND BBS_SHOW_YN = 'Y'
AND WRITE_YMD BETWEEN REPLACE(#{startDate},'-','') AND REPLACE(#{endDate},'-','')
AND CMGRP_CD = #{loginCmgrpCd} ORDER BY RID DESC OFFSET ${startPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT ${paging} ROWS ONLY

WITH WW AS ( SELECT A.ID , A.TITLE , A.USER_ID , FN_USER_NAME(A.USER_ID) USER_NAME , FN_TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_DATE , A.CONTENTS , A.HIT , A.WRITE_YMD , BBS_SHOW_YN , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ID) RID , CMGRP_CD FROM BBS A WHERE BBS_TYPE = 'A' AND WRITE_YMD > '19900101' ) SELECT * FROM WW WHERE RID BETWEEN #{rid} - 2 AND #{rid} + 2 AND CMGRP_CD = #{loginCmgrpCd} ORDER BY RID DESC
mapper.update: WITH WW AS ( SELECT A.ID , A.TITLE , A.USER_ID , FN_USER_NAME(A.USER_ID) USER_NAME , FN_TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_DATE , A.CONTENTS , A.HIT , A.ATTACH_FILE_URL1 , A.ATTACH_FILE_URL2 , A.ATTACH_FILE_URL3 , A.ATTACH_FILE_URL4 , A.ATTACH_FILE_URL5 , LAG(A.TITLE) OVER (ORDER BY ID) PRE_TITLE , LEAD(A.TITLE) OVER (ORDER BY ID) AFT_TITLE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ID) RID , A.CMGRP_CD FROM BBS A WHERE BBS_TYPE = 'A' AND WRITE_YMD > '19900101' AND CMGRP_CD = #{loginCmgrpCd} ) UPDATE WW SET HIT = HIT +1 WHERE RID = #{rid} AND CMGRP_CD = #{loginCmgrpCd}
